labels: "-Top Level Document, _Production Plan"
assignees: ''

---

_Goes beyond “options menu” into full inclusive design._

## Includes

* _Accessibility pillars_
* _Industry standard benchmarks (Xbox Guidelines, IGDA, Sony)_
* _Visual, auditory, motor, cognitive accommodation features_
* _UI/UX contrast & readability standards_
* _Input remapping strategy_
* _Subtitles & caption rules_
* _Blind/low-vision support (TTS, spatial audio)_
* _Accessibility QA milestones_
* _Community advisory council_

## Why AAA Needs It

_Accessibility expectations are rapidly rising and can impact ratings, PR, and platform approvals._
